text: Sprite Creek is a river in Fulton County and Herkimer County in the U.S. State of New York. It begins at Canada Lake northwest of the Hamlet of Caroga Lake, and flows through Lily Lake before converging witn the East Canada Creek northeast of the Village of Dolgeville. == References == Category:Rivers of Fulton County, New York Category:Rivers of New York (state)
title: Sprite Creek
